text: Sean Edward Chiplock (born June 21, 1990) is an American voice actor who voices for English versions of anime and Japanese video games. Based in Los Angeles, Chiplock is known as the voice of Alderman in web series Indigo Ignited, Rean Schwarzer from The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel series, Revali from The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Kiyotaka Ishimaru and Monotaro from the Danganronpa series, and Subaru Natsuki from Re:Zero. ==Filmography== ===Anime=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
